name: Score and Win - FreeKick 3D World Cup
name_original: Score and Win - FreeKick 3D World Cup
description:
The Best Soccer FREEKICKER, the most realistic football arcade game!

Score goals and win the World Cup!

Playing the best 3D FREEKICKER - you will enjoy the atmosphere of a football game, drive and excitement as it possible.

Choose your favorite team, go through all the stages of the championship & make your team a winner in the world football championship.

Conduct training, hone your strike and become the real champion!

***FEATURES***
- Intuitive game control
- The best 3D graphics
- Unique modes of training
- Minimum commercials
- The game was developed with the participation of professional football players!

If you have confidence in your skills on the field, this game is created just for you! Ready to test your strength and get the trophy?

Install the game now! Forward to the victory!

Good luck in the game!
